section.p: Customers are the companies, departments, or people who subscribe to one or more marketable services on a marketplace. After a customer has subscribed to a service in , his registered users who are assigned to the subscription can work with the underlying application in the Cloud.
Customers perform the following basic tasks which are described in more detail in the sections below:

ul.li: Access the services they want to subscribe to on a marketplace.
Register service users and assign them to subscriptions.
Use the services they subscribed to.

section.p: Customers can use the reporting facilities provided by to get, for example, an overview on all users assigned to their subscriptions and on the billable events that occurred in using the services.
